participant_1.background:
I start my day early, walk my dog, and then work on my tasks until late at night, listening to music about animals.
My first cup of coffee in the morning is the best part of my day.
i am divorced.
I enjoy my tea while I am working on my goals, and it helps me stay focused and productive.
Last year I moved into a new home that perfectly fit my needs.

my beer gut is so huge i have not seen my feet in two years.

I get my creative energy from listening to music and trying to create my own.
i have been working the same job for two years.

content.text: Good, I just got done with a long day of work. How about you?
I'm doing well. Just started my day. I'm a big fan of music, so I always like to listen to something in the morning. What are you listening to these days?
I've been listening to a lot of new music lately. I'm really into artists like Khalid and Billie Eilish. What about you? Do you have a favorite artist or band?
I love Khalid! My favorite band is probably The 1975. I also really like listening to music from the 80s and 90s. What's your favorite genre of music?
I'm all over the place when it comes to music. I love hip hop, pop, rock, R&B, etc. I just love music in general. What are your favorite hobbies?
I love to cook and bake. I also like to go for walks with my dog. What are your hobbies?
I love to play video games. I also like to go hiking and camping. I'm not very active, but I try to get out and do something every weekend.
That's great. I love to go camping too, but I haven't been in a while. Maybe we can go camping together sometime.
That would be awesome! I'm always looking for new people to go camping with.
Great! I'll send you a message later and we can figure out a date
